answerText: La Grande Odalisque [10] La Grande Odalisque is by this French academic painter of exotic nudes, such as his The Turkish Bath. His non-Orientalist works include The Apotheosis of Homer.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | RPI | 4 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A jeweled belt lies on the yellow-gold blanket next to the title figure, who clutches a peacock fan. For 10 points each: [10] Name this portrait of a nude woman reclining on a blue divan and glancing at the viewer over her shoulder, much criticized in its day for depicting an impossible contortion of the human body.
